description:
Meta has spearheaded an open letter calling for urgent reform of AI regulations in the EU. The letter, which garnered support from over 50 prominent companies – including Ericsson, SAP, and Spotify – was published as an advert in the Financial Times. The collective voice of these industry leaders highlights a pressing issue: Europe’s bureaucratic... Read more »

The post Tech industry giants urge EU to streamline AI regulations appeared first on AI News.
title: Tech industry giants urge EU to streamline AI regulations
